Question.label:
Where is the woman calling ?</>
An office. A garage. A doctor's surgery. A factory
What information does that man ask for ?</>
The woman's name. The registration number of the bike. The make of the bike. The woman's phone number.
What is the man going to do ?</>
Call the suppliers. Call the woman back. Order a new part. Pick up the motorbike.

Where are they ?</>
In a shop. In a college. In the street. In a factory
Where is the manager's office ?</>
On the second floor. Near the restaurant. Next to the changing rooms. Next to the staff kitchen.
What is on the lower ground floor ?</>
The household goods department. The staff kitchen. The restaurant. The changing rooms.

What is the woman doing this evening ?</>
Catching a train. Taking a flight. Going on holiday. Meeting a friend.
What time is the taxi coming ?</>
8' o'clock. 7' o'clock. Half past four. Half past two.
How long will the woman's journey take ? </>
1 and a half hours. 2 and a half hours. 4 and a half hours. 8 and a half hours.

Where did the woman go at the weekend ?</>
To a city. To the beach. To the countryside. To visit a friend.
What was the weather like at the weekend ?</>
Sunny. Cloudy. Rainy. Snowy
What did the man do at the weekend ?</>
He got married. He had a party. He went out for a drink. He prepared for his wedding

What does the man need ?</>
Red pens. Blue pens. Black pens. Green pens.
The man thought that stationery was kept ...</>
In a drawer. In a desk. On a shelf. In a cupboard.
The man wants to order some equipment to ...</>
Make corrections. Hold documents together. Print out documents. File documents away.
